name: Flopon the Space Mutant
overview: Flopon the Space Mutants / Trip'D (宇宙生物フロポン君) is a puzzle game by Kenji Eno and the cult game company WARP (D, D2, Enemy Zero). It is a wacky twisted puzzle game with odd graphics and sound. Also includes some crazy mini-games. I recommend the title, it's one of my favorites on the 3DO. Can be played without knowing Japanese.
